channel.title: Work in progress on Suzanne Bellue
channel.description: Recent content in Work in progress on Suzanne Bellue

item.title: Social Mobility with Subjective Beliefs: The Effects of Neighborhoods on Investment Choices
item.description: Neighborhoods in the US shape future economics outcomes of children who grow up in them, and their endogenous demographic composition define who are the role models for those children. I develop and estimate a structural spatial equilibrium model of parental investments in which residential choices exogenously impact the human capital formation of children, and endogenously shape their expectations about the returns to educational investments.

item.title: Macroeconomic Consequences of Early Education Tracking
Employment Transitions: Mechanisms For Gender Earnings Gap
